Insect Science.1: Demonstrate a broad range of knowledge and understanding of insect biology, physiology, classification, ecology and behavior, and insect pest management.
Insect Science.2: Apply content knowledge to solve problems, both theoretical and practical.
Insect Science.3: Communicate through writings and oral presentations, complex ideas and develop sound arguments based on technical knowledge.
Insect Science.4: Conduct original research that includes developing a hypothesis, designing appropriate experiments, collecting and analyzing data, interpreting results, and drawing conclusions.
